service.name: Forex
service.content: Trade over 100 currency pairs, including the majors, minors and exotics, with ultra-low spreads and fast execution.

service.name: Precious Metals
service.content: Speculate on the price movements of Gold and Silver against the US Dollar and diversify your trading portfolio.

service.name: Stocks
service.content: Get access to major international stocks (Apple, Google, Tesla) with no commissions or requotes and no hidden mark-ups.

service.name: Energies
service.content: Trade CFDs on spot energies such as Brent oil and natural gas with no commissions or requotes and no hidden mark-ups.

service.name: Stock Indices
service.content: Get access to major international stock indices (S&P 500, Nasdaq 100) with no commissions or requotes and no hidden mark-ups.

service.name: Cryptocurrencies
service.content: Trade the new era of currencies such as Bitcoin, Etherium and Litecoin with ultra-low spreads and fast execution.

service.name: Commodities
service.content: Trade over a vast variety of commodities (Cotton, Cocoa, Wheat) with ultra-low spreads and fast execution.
